long_description: Get essential running data like your distance and pace with the Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS fitness monitor. It features a color display, button operation and a comfortable hinged wristband. Like a personal coach, the Forerunner 220 gives you constant feedback with vibration alerts, plus a post-run summary; get heart rate data with optional sensor, not included. Built-in accelerometer tracks distance for your indoor track or treadmill workouts, with no need for a foot pod. The Forerunner 220 also tracks your personal records and has features such as automatic uploads to Garmin Connect(TM), live tracking and social media sharing. Pair the Garmin Forerunner 220 GPS fitness monitor with free training plans from Garmin Connect for real-time coaching.
